name: Met ECS
description: A simple Entity Component System library heavily based on ENTT library. Made for learning purposes, there are still bugs to cover.

name: Which Gui
description: I am remaking the same interfaces across multiple technologies. HTML, QT, XAML, etc. I pick the ui to integrate from video-games.

name: Roll Goal
description: A mini-game coming from The legend of zelda that I am remaking across multiple game engines (Unreal, Unity, Godot).
